          <title>
            <string language="en">Types of switches for electronic control circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der Schalter für elektronisches 
Steuerstromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de passages pour des circuits de commande 
électronique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de interruptores para circuitos de controle 
eletrônico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di interruttori per i circuiti di controllo 
elettronico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι διακοπτών για τα ηλεκτρονικά κυκλώματα ελέγχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tipos de interruptores para los circuitos de 
control electrónico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows samples of switches which are useful as input sensors in electronic control circuits.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic control circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron strips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic switches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">push switches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tilt switches</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Proben der Schalter, welche 
als Input-Sensoren in den elektronisches Steuerstromkreisen nützlich 
sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des échantillons de 
commutateurs ce qui sont utiles comme capteurs d'entrée dans des 
circuits de commande électronique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra amostras dos interruptores
quais são úteis como sensores da entrada em circuitos de controle 
eletrônico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i campioni degli 
interruttori quale sono utili come sensori dell'input in circuiti di 
controllo elettronico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δείγματα των διακοπτών 
που είναι χρήσιμα ως αισθητήρες εισόδου στα ηλεκτρονικά 
κυκλώματα ελέγχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra muestras de interruptores
cuál es útil como sensores de la entrada de información en 
circuitos de control electrónico.</string>
          </description>
